data.title: Will Patton Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Will Patton on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Will Patton including Horizon: An American Saga Chapter 1, Gone in Sixty Secâ¦
data.text:
The O.G.

When Don and his team are called to the murder scene of a Los Angeles gang member, they learn that the victim is a fellow agent who had been working undercover. Without exposing the agent's cover, Don must investigate his murder by a rival gang and try to crack the gangs' leadership and territories to find the suspect. However, the agents are surprised when they learn who is responsible for the source of the rivalry. Will Patton guest stars.

End of Watch

Don and the FBI re-open a 17-year-old unsolved case when the badge of a missing LAPD officer, who is presumed dead, is found at a construction site. The police investigating the case believe that a former gang member-turned- activist was responsible for the police officer's death because he was seeking revenge for the murder of his brother. However, Charlie analyzes the data on the case and discovers the location of where the victim was killed, leading the FBI to a tangled web of suspects, informants and dirty cops.

Robin Hood

A bank for the rich and powerful is robbed but the stolen contents of the safety deposit boxes are being liquidated and donated to charities, and it's up to Don and Charlie to uncover the true motivation behind the humanitarian thief.

Unshockable

Rascal Flatts takes center stage when a band member is electrocuted by his own guitar during a concert, the CSI team investigates if it was a case of foul play. (TV-14)

Day 7: 6:00 A.M. - 7:00 A.M.

Jack Bauer is forced to help Tony escape from custody, only to find Tony plans to use Jack to reconstitute the pathogen. Aaron Pierce and Ethan Kanin work together and discover Olivia's role in Hodges' murder. Kim Bauer takes down her captors, and works with Renee Walker to find her father.
